text: Gakapiteje genego, a Yoshepu bha ku Alimataya, gubhaajujile a Pilato bhatole shiilu sha a Yeshu. A Yoshepu pubhaliji bhaajiganywa bha a Yeshu, ikabheje kwa nng'iyo, pabha bhatendaga kwaajogopanga ashikalongolele bha Shiyaudi. Bhai, a Pilato gubhajitishiye. Kwa nneyo a Yoshepu gubhapite shoya shiilu sha a Yeshu.
